title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-6.2 - Collection of assessments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-6.2 - Collection of assessments

State Regulations

Any assessment required by Workers' Compensation Law, sections 15(8)(h)(4), 25-A(3) and 151(2)(b) that are collected by an insurer or SIF from policyholders shall be collected through a surcharge based on standard premium in a percentage to be determined by the superintendent in consultation with NYCIRB and the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
